snippet: A campaign aims to persuade those who collaborate with the Israeli authorities to turn themselves in, suggesting that their cases would be settled quietly.
lead_paragraph: A campaign aims to persuade those who collaborate with the Israeli authorities to turn themselves in, suggesting that their cases would be settled quietly.

headline.seo: Hamas Urges Collaborators With Israel to Surrender
headline.main: Offering Amnesty, Hamas Urges Collaborators With Israel to Surrender
headline.print_headline: Offering Amnesty, Hamas Urges Collaborators With Israel to Surrender
